mapper.select: SELECT oms_order.*, oi.id item_id, oi.product_id item_product_id, oi.product_sn item_product_sn, oi.product_pic item_product_pic, oi.product_name item_product_name, oi.product_brand item_product_brand, oi.product_price item_product_price, oi.product_quantity item_product_quantity, oi.product_attr item_product_attr, oi.product_category_id item_product_category_id, oi.sp1 item_sp1, oi.sp2 item_sp2, oi.sp3 item_sp3, oms_his.id history_id, oms_his.operate_man history_operate_man, oms_his.create_time history_create_time, oms_his.order_status history_order_status, oms_his.note history_note FROM oms_order LEFT JOIN oms_order_item oi ON oms_order.id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN oms_order_operate_history oms_his ON oms_order.id = oms_his.order_id WHERE oms_order.id = #{id} ORDER BY oi.id ASC, oms_his.create_time DESC
